description:
**Administrative Assistant Opportunity**

Position Summary

As an Administrative Assistant, you will be responsible for handling administrative tasks of moderate scope and complexity with some independence and familiarity with relevant procedures.

Responsibilities

  • Perform various administrative duties following established procedures
  • Enter data into ERP systems
  • Manage quote statuses, follow-up activities, and processing
  • Review and process purchase orders
  • Manage customer portals by downloading/uploading RFQ's, Purchase Orders, and Execution reports
  • Process credit/add bills
  • Submit WAWF submissions
  • Process CAVs and provide status updates
  • Enter and manage data using spreadsheet software and databases
  • Conduct basic mathematical calculations
  • Prepare, review, and distribute documents, ensuring accuracy
  • Assist in the administration of assigned activities
  • Handle inquiries and ensure objectives are met
  • Interface with departments, teams, and customers effectively
  • Maintain organized files and records
  • Schedule appointments and make travel arrangements
  • Coordinate group meetings and logistics
  • Manage confidential records and reports
  • Order supplies and stationery

Job Requirements

  • Two years of relevant office experience or demonstrated ability
  • Typing speed of 50 wpm
  • Proficiency in Microsoft Office programs (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)
  • Knowledge of terminology in the functional area
  • Strong verbal, written, and interpersonal communication skills
  • Ability to work collaboratively and be a team player

Employment Type: Temporary
